Text.Page:
Jax hires only the best. Our people are our best asset.

And we need some help hiring...hiring workers who'll do anything for the organization, if you know what I mean. See what you can find around Cutthroat Harbor.

A job with Jax?

Beats starving. I'm in.
Are you kidding? I'd kill for a job!

For what we have in mind, those hobos are perfect.

Take your reward, and remember: this is a labor-intensive industry. We always need more workers who'll do whatever it takes.
